Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, human cathelicidin analog, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature.Author: Guo X, An Y, Tan W, Ma L, Wang M, Li J, Li B, Hou W, Wu L. 2023
Literature.Title: Cathelicidin-derived antiviral peptide inhibits herpes simplex virus 1 infection.

Sequence Information.Comments: Peptide design: WL-1 is a modified version of GF-17 by making the following changes F17W, V21K, F27K, and deleting V32.Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence shows similarity (76.47%) toGF-17K: 25%; R: 19%, I=L: 13%.Activity: inhibited herpes simplex virus 1 (HSV-1) infection in epithelial and neuronal cells.Animal model:mouse: beneficial treatment outcomes were observed in HSV-1 ear infected mice after WL-1 treatment.
